passwordReset.title: Password Reset Request
passwordReset.instructions: We received a request to reset your password. Click the button below to create a new password.
passwordReset.validityNotice: This link is valid for 1 hour
passwordReset.alternativeInstructions: Copy and paste this link into your browser:
timeLimitList: This link will expire in 1 hour
After expiration, you'll need to request a new password reset
For security, all existing sessions will be terminated after password change
passwordReset.notYouInstructions: If you didn't request a password reset, your account may be at risk. We recommend:
notYouList: Do not click the reset link
Change your password immediately through the login page
passwordReset.securityMessage: Never share your password or reset links with anyone. Barksys will never ask for your password via email.
securityList: This link will expire in 1 hour
Do not share this link with anyone
passwordReset.closingMessage: If you have any concerns about your account security, please contact us immediately.
